objects.name: AS_CO_CONS_QE_RETURN_TYPES
objects.description: All available query entity return types, used by rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

objects.name: AS_CO_TYPE_Dictionary
objects.description: Returns `type!{}Dictionary` used for casting purposes

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_ContainsValueByField
objects.description: it's only used by `AS_CO_UT_Filter`.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter
objects.description: Filters, rejects, or returns matching indices of a list of records by field-value filter combinations.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_Filter_Reducer
objects.description: Do not call this rule directly, it's only used by `AS_CO_UT_Filter`.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfArrayType
objects.description: Returns true if the `type` or `typeOf` inputs represent an array type

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfSingleType
objects.description: Returns true if the `type` or `typeOf` inputs represent a singular, non-array type

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_chooseWherecontainsHelper
objects.description: Helps when combining choose() and wherecontains(), returns 1 if no match found, or else returns the index + 1

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
objects.description: Executes displayValue, but allows setting the default to either the first or last value of the replacement list, or a custom value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_enumForCount
objects.description: Return an enumerator for the count of the input objects

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl
objects.description: Returns the URL of the site, terminating in /suite/
called_by: AS GCM CEDM Export Environment Data

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field
called_by: AS GCM CEDM Export Environment Data

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.
called_by: AS GCM CEDM Export Environment Data

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isRecordTypeData
objects.description: Returns true if the passed data is of type record type

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
objects.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber
objects.description: Returns the array type number from the input type. If type number being passed is already that of a array, returns the same number.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnNullDictionary
objects.description: Returns a null dictionary

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnNullDictionaryList
objects.description: Returns a null list of dictionary

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnSingleTypeObject
objects.description: Takes in either an array type or a primitive type and returns the singular type object, works for CDTs or primitive types

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber
objects.description: Returns the typeNumber of either `type` or `typeOf`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_sortArray
objects.description: Sorts an array of primitive types (e.g. text, integers, dates)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_typeCompare
objects.description: Returns true if the two input types match

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtByKeyValues
objects.description: Allows passing a map of key-value pairs as an update parameter

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs
objects.description: Allows passing field-value pairs to handle for use cases where you have to set newValues as arrays

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByPath
objects.description: Updates one or more fields of a CDT, allows passing a path (e.g. fieldA[1].fieldB...)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains
objects.description: Enhanced wherecontains() which avoids type-casting issues and properly handles for document and group types

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayConvertHandler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_indexPath`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_indexPath`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_separateFieldHandler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByPath`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_updateCdtFieldsByPath_handler
objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByPath`

objects.description: Used by rule `AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByPath`

objects.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_GAM_UT_ArrayLength
objects.description: Gives length of an array based on input of array

objects.name: AS_GAM_UT_queryEntityWithSelection
objects.description: Generic query entity with query selection (So that huge load can be avoided while querying)

objects.name: AS_GAM_UT_sortAnyData
objects.description: Sorts a CDT, dictionary, record or complex type.  Pass nullsFirst to explicitly sort nulls first or last. Also sorts simple type data when the field is null

objects.name: AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField
objects.description: Filters CDT or record data by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_GAM_rejectCdtOrRecordDataByField
objects.description: Rejects CDT or record data by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are rejected

objects.name: AS_GAM_returnCdtOrRecordIndicesByField
objects.description: Returns the Index CDT or record data by matching a single value or list of values in a single field

objects.name: AS_GCM_CEDM_GetRecordFieldsListByRecordType
objects.description: Returns list of simple record fields based on given record type

objects.name: AS_GCM_CEDM_RetrievePrecedentRecordFieldMaps_Recursion
objects.description: Recursion rule to return precedent record field maps based on parent record
